channel.title: How do i add comands
channel.description: How can i add commands to a 525 server?

item.title: How do i add comands
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

is there a Commands.java (or Commands.class) file within the server? if so, edit the .java one, and search for a command you know is already there. add your commands after that (to make sure it is in the right place).

example:

lets say you know “::help” is in the server already. open up commands.java in notepad, press Ctrl+F (find), and type in help. press enter, and something like this will come up:

if (c.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) { .....doSomething(); }

lets say you want to add “pure” to the commands list. after the last bracket, add this:

if (c.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { .....doSomethingElse(); }

and that should be it. good luck.

Read full topic
